title: FT/FS: Bescher hands in Air EPDG. SGC 60 - SOLD

posts.post_title: FT/FS: Bescher hands in Air EPDG. SGC 60 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have downgraded my Bescher so this one is available. Asking $SOLD or trade for like EPDGs......will also consider graded HOFers and other tough backs.  Just shoot me a PM with what you got.

Thanks
